abstract: Gary D. Cohn says that Goldman is currently examining all euro-denominated contracts to understand what the ability to pay in a different currency would be if the euro disappears.
snippet: Gary D. Cohn says that Goldman is currently examining all euro-denominated contracts to understand what the ability to pay in a different currency would be if the euro disappears.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs has intensified its efforts to prepare for an extreme deterioration in Europe, including a possible dissolution of the euro.

headline.main: Goldman Prepares for Worst-Case Outcome in Europe
